description: Heymarket is a business texting platform that gives you the power to engage with people using shared inboxes.

actions.name: createOrUpdateContact
actions.description: Create a new contact or update an existing contact by phone number

actions.name: sendCustomMessage
actions.description: Send a custom text message to an individual contact or a list

actions.name: sendTemplateMessage
actions.description: Send a message using a template to an individual contact or a list

actions.name: updateList
actions.description: Update an existing list in your team by adding or removing members, or updating list properties

triggers.name: chatStarted
triggers.description: Trigger when a new conversation is started or an existing conversation is updated

triggers.name: newOrUpdatedContact
triggers.description: Trigger when a new contact is created or an existing contact is updated
